channel.title: the Acro Guru - AcroYoga Coruña
channel.description: Recent content on the Acro Guru - AcroYoga Coruña

item.title: Bio
item.description: Acerca de mí Estos son mis principios (pero si no le gustan, tengo otros): Disciplina. Respeto. Confianza. Humor. He estado practicando yoga desde 2009, cuando había tan sólo 3 o 4 centros de yoga en Coruña, como quien dice. Comencé con Iyengar Yoga debido a una grave lesión en la espalda. Más tarde practiqué las series de Ashtanga y exploré diversos métodos y disciplinas. Desde el 2016 he estado mejorando mis conocimientos de masaje tailandés, Yoga, acro y otras artes y disciplinas relacionadas, estudiando un curso de masaje en la Escuela de Medicina Tradicinal Chinesa de Lisboa, talleres en la escuela de tailandés Hadadi, lecciones de Ashtanga con Xico Rodrigues, Filipa Veiga, Yoga con Margarida Alonso, Filipe Santos, Marta Coias, AcroYoga con Jerzy Badach, Daniel Scott, Lux SeattleAcro, Andrea Macia, Jacob Brown y Debbie Collis… entre otros, contemporáneo con Alba Cotelo, breaking con Samuel_aka_Serio… Kung Fu con Guilherme Luz… y comencé mi formación de maestro en AcroYoga con los increíbles Lucas y Maria de Acro.

item.title: Clases
item.description: No hay clases regulares hasta después del verano. Si te interesan manda tu disponibilidad para ver si formamos grupo regular en septiembre u octubre. Puedes contactar para jams o aulas privadas. Suscribete a las redes para estar al tanto de talleres y eventos.

item.title: FlashMob AY portugal community
item.description: Folded leaf 1/2 Bow St. Throne (F2m) Whale Throne twist Back bird Bat (+to bird) +Ninja stars S.Yogi + tell me more Bow F2S S2H Chair +titibhasana, pop to bird out #flow #flashmob #aypt

item.title: Flow a38
item.description: #flow #method #theacroguru F2S +W3 Bird Throne + trono jamón F2m Couch x throne couch tic tocs (+ CPS) Whale (CPW) F.Leaf (+p. twist) Bat + back bird ++rev bird

item.title: Flow AcroIyengar sequence 1
item.description: Bow St. Throne Ninja throne (skandasana) Parivritta janu sisrsasana (bend to nin th.) Mermaid Garudasana (aka thinker aka whirly) Parsvakonasana (twisted W1) Tree (flamingo) Utkatasana Uttanasana A.M.Swasana (d.dog f.hands on b.elbows) Paschimotanasana Janu sirsasana (fwd) +Ustrasana Balasana

item.title: Flow Acrovinyasa 1
item.description: https://youtu.be/YNFFkIFrWgg bird, bow 1/2 bhekasana, shalabasana (thight sup), stag climbers F2S, utka, sides, padangusth chair, 1/2 padma sides, whale straddle throne, mermaid f.leaf, prasaritta twist, vashistasana (tictoc to 2nd side) hangle dangle, float.paschi, stag back bird, fish, back bow, nataraj, navasan, back plank back candle, bat, star (1/2 barrel to bird) S2F, garuda (eagle), ustrasan (camel), child baka (sup shoulderstand), stag, (front) candle, stag s.yogi, rev.nam, walnut, turntable (straddle baby bat shoulder stretch)

item.title: Suga Mama Flow
item.description: #flow #method #theacroguru IN opt.: Walk in jump Slide from F2s Bird F2S F2m ++trono jamón (+++S2F, Chair, Stand on thights, Flag and back) Couch (++ C.P.S., C.P.W., C.P.Shins) b.s.whip (+++ballerina, pop to L-Sit on armpits) Mermaid (machine) F.Leaf +p.twist +Star ++Paschi on Star OUT: Floating Paschi *insert below machines at the poses that they begin in, in the above flow v2.0 machines to insert:

item.title: yo'lil' grasshopper flow
item.description: #flow #method #theacroguru v1: IN: Sidestar Ninja 4Steps Ninja Steps Naked S. (“el pollo ninja”) 1/2 p.pocket biglemoi +drop to cath’s wheel mermaid, +from L-Sit: sweeping beauty corkscrew tumble weed –king of thrones / twist to koala OUT: from koala HS out sideways v2: ++at cath’s wheel: +b.rev bird catch on: bird2H mermaid v3: pollo ninja –> nataraj v3.3 (possibles): Corkscrew + rev.star tumbleweed ?B.Barrell + hi ninja, redrum

HS rolls / croquetas Carretillas, random leg releases ++say one hand LR Camina el pájaro (walk the bird) Trono jamón (Hammy throne) Poc, splits. Lux birdcycles #acrofunkers #warmup

#partner #warmup cell squats push planks sisifo walks: vs wall, vs. d.dog jedi: crawl, boxes ++F2H boxes –r.twists (could back to back) climbers vs. (+2p holds feet) ++up declined, carretilla 1H LR name leg raises (2p. pushes back) boat clocks vs hollow holds iron throne push +1/2 high ++stand on thighs anchors w1 w.up

#yoga #partner #thai #sequence 2p. standing face to face: warmup Tadasana Uttanasana, table hold 90deg arms interlace with mirror person D.Dog hands kisses side to side Hey yo, gangsta salutation aka barrel hands Matrix down and ups, in turns +Dropback assisted Hi moon : tadasanas hands mirror side bends Uttanasana massages Back to back Squat down (cellsquats game if not to cooldown) cooldown and stretch Lotus (r.)twists Paschi vs back2back stretch ^e3036a
IN & OUT PLANKS BOAT HOLD R.TWIST (HIGH OR PLANK) KNEE TAPS H.K. RAISES L-SIT KICKS + HOLD #workout #abs
BOAT CLIMBERS RUSSIAN TWISTS FLUTTER KICKS L-SIT KICKS + HOLD AB WHEEL + FEET PLANK SHOULDER ISO TAPS ON PLANK (2 PoC) ARCHER / TYPEWRITER D.DOG CIRCLES, 8s FLOAT Fwd, + HS #workout #abs #arms

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X0Q71ruE3kU Banana hold Leg raises Wave legs raises Feet kisses Scissors Rev. crunch (up to sarvangasana) Tic tacs (side to side legs) iso tic tacs (crossed) Leg circles (KF) Bicycle (same, +iso) Planks: wide forearm legs up LR woolf #abs #milli
/!\ : x20 reps | x3-4 sets Bear kick tru M. Climbers Goddess (pose) obliques W3 + knee pull R. twists

#workout #medrano ~16 +2 ISO PLANKS +P.UPS SQUAT STAIRS KNEE GETUPS PLANK 2 FOREARMS +TO SQUAT POSE SKIER SIDE TO SIDE TOE TOUCHES BUTT KICKS P.UP TO SIDE PLANKS BICYCLES+ R.TWISTS P.UP+BIRDS ON GROUND (SHALABASANA) FROGGERS +CROW PREP HIGH KNEE TAPS (L,R! x SQUAT) BEAR CRAWLS +SHOULDER TAPS ++PIKED FOR ELEPHANTS +SHOULDER TAPS PLANKS TO FOREARMS WHILE CLIMBERS L-BASE TOE TOUCH, +ISO LOUNGES JUMPS CHANGE SIDES BEAR TOE TAPS +PLANK TOE TAPS

#HIIT #warmup 45s HIIT, rest 15s Leg flutters Reach ups (bent legs) ?Jacknife Low boat hold Laying windshield wipes Star asym crunches Seated in n out r. twists bicycles m. climbers Hi side plank raises Hi side plank reach trus Plank toe taps (+walk salsa sides) Leg raise Lo boat hold Burp in n out (legs together) Plank hold Side plank Chair sit ups (asym) Crossed m. climbers

item.title: 16 beginner washing machines
item.description: #beginner recommended #theacroguru 16 #washingmachines vocabulary roadmap throne twist 1/2 barrel, barrell roll | attitude | w.rumpus | mermaid | | trapdoor | monkey frog | CPS | | ninja bats | 4 steps | p.twist | | buddha roll | tumbleweed | helicopter | p.loop rev. trapdoor #superdave #washingmachines 1-4 https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4YelV9NbCqGQnf6q3EAxq-eJUjq7pKbu Attitude prep (SD4) Bird sidestar whale throne ++pop Helicopter, mermaid prep (SD3) Pinoplaya +twist to+ Bat +tru legs to+

item.title: Acro Alchemy
item.description: Acro Alchemist! A Permutations combinatoric game! *Elements sampling: | Naked | Corkscrew | Sit n Spin | Ballerina | | Biglemoi | Nunchuck | Pickpocket | Attitude | | Koala | Cath's Wheel | Trapdoor | Helicopter| Na Co Ss Ba Bi Nu Pp At Ko Cw Tr He | Revolutions | LA Gear | Hamster | Pythagoras | | Meet Winder | Twisted Tornado | Monkey Frog | Wild Rumpus | Re La Ha Py

item.title: The Acro Red Book
item.description: WELCOME TO the Red Acro Book of @theacroguru Ask for any of this at the jams or take a glance at what i base my classes on (search for the name of the stuff + acroyoga on youtube if there’s no link) My four (or 7?) elements: warmups / workouts flows / washing machines theacroguru method cooldown / thai massage #flow #method #theacroguru #acroyoga
